attributes.action: Make the installation and use of tachographs in all commercial vehicles compulsory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: H G V and coach drivers have a maximum number of hours they are allowed to drive/work in any day/week/fortnight. Drivers of smaller commercial vehicles can drive/work as many hours as their employer tells them to. This must be a danger on our roads. Research shows tired driving is at least as dangerous as drink/drug driving.
